snippet: The Network for Public Education will call for curriculums that include arts and foreign languages, as well as better financing for schools and more respect for teachers.
abstract: New advocacy group Network for Public Education will grade and endorse political candidates; it will call for curriculums that include arts and foreign languages, as well as better financing for schools and more respect for teachers; group was formed by historian Diane Ravitch and other education advocates.
lead_paragraph: The Network for Public Education will call for curriculums that include arts and foreign languages, as well as better financing for schools and more respect for teachers.

headline.seo: Diane Ravitch Joins Group to Monitor Public Schools
headline.main: Advocacy Group to Monitor Reform Efforts in Public Schools
headline.print_headline: Advocacy Group to Monitor Reform Efforts in Public Schools
